Bihar.name: Araria
Bihar.description: Known for its cultural diversity and agriculture.

Bihar.name: Arwal
Bihar.description: Small district carved out of Jehanabad.

Bihar.name: Aurangabad
Bihar.description: Known for Deo Sun Temple and historic forts.

Bihar.name: Banka
Bihar.description: Gateway to Bhagalpur division, rich in minerals.

Bihar.name: Begusarai
Bihar.description: Industrial hub known as the 'Leningrad of Bihar'.

Bihar.name: Bhagalpur
Bihar.description: Famous for silk production and Vikramshila ruins.

Bihar.name: Bhojpur
Bihar.description: Known for Ara city and historical significance.

Bihar.name: Buxar
Bihar.description: Historic place known for Battle of Buxar (1764).

Bihar.name: Darbhanga
Bihar.description: Cultural capital of Mithila region.

Bihar.name: East Champaran
Bihar.description: Place where Mahatma Gandhi started Champaran Satyagraha.

Bihar.name: Gaya
Bihar.description: Famous for Bodh Gaya, a major Buddhist pilgrimage site.

Bihar.name: Gopalganj
Bihar.description: Agricultural region with rich cultural traditions.

Bihar.name: Jamui
Bihar.description: Known for ancient temples and wildlife sanctuary.

Bihar.name: Jehanabad
Bihar.description: Located near Patna, known for agriculture.

Bihar.name: Kaimur
Bihar.description: Rich in forests, hills, and ancient rock paintings.

Bihar.name: Katihar
Bihar.description: Major railway junction and trading center.

Bihar.name: Khagaria
Bihar.description: Located on the banks of Ganga and Kosi rivers.

Bihar.name: Kishanganj
Bihar.description: Tea-producing region with scenic beauty.

Bihar.name: Lakhisarai
Bihar.description: Known for archaeological sites and temples.

Bihar.name: Madhepura
Bihar.description: Home to famous engineer George Fernandesâ€™s birthplace.

Bihar.name: Madhubani
Bihar.description: Famous for Mithila paintings and culture.

Bihar.name: Munger
Bihar.description: Known for Bihar School of Yoga and historical forts.

Bihar.name: Muzaffarpur
Bihar.description: Famous for Shahi Litchi and trade.

Bihar.name: Nalanda
Bihar.description: Home of ancient Nalanda University, a UNESCO site.

Bihar.name: Nawada
Bihar.description: Known for temples and natural beauty.

Bihar.name: Patna
Bihar.description: Capital city, rich in history and modern development.

Bihar.name: Purnia
Bihar.description: Agricultural hub known for banana production.

Bihar.name: Rohtas
Bihar.description: Home to Rohtasgarh Fort and waterfalls.

Bihar.description: Important rail and agricultural district.

Bihar.name: Saran
Bihar.description: Historic district with cultural heritage.

Bihar.name: Sheikhpura
Bihar.description: Small district carved from Munger region.

Bihar.name: Sheohar
Bihar.description: Smallest district of Bihar, near Sitamarhi.

Bihar.name: Sitamarhi
Bihar.description: Believed to be birthplace of Goddess Sita.

Bihar.name: Siwan
Bihar.description: Known for history and education.

Bihar.name: Supaul
Bihar.description: Part of Koshi region, agriculture-based district.
